Snowpack vs river flows

Inter market, multi timeframe analysis and how to plan your July 4 river activities

The CO snow pack ‚ö´Ô∏è (Platte River Basin) doesn't peak until late March/early April.

A couple weeks after the snow pack entered a stage 4 decline river flows üîµ broke out to a stage 2 uptrend as they rose from the low flow, dormant winter levels

The rivers peaked around June 14 this year and are now in a stage 4 decline.

The pink 30 day river flow chart shows a series of LH and LL since about the 14th.   

Here is where the forecast comes in.  

If you are looking to go tubing/kayaking/ rafting, the peak flows (bounce in downtrend) occur at approximately 8AM 

If you are looking for best fishing condition, the lowest flows occur at approx 5PM which makes the evening best for fishing.

It is counter intuitive to think the lower flows occur in the evening but it takes a while for that snow to melt and head downstream.

10/10 I‚Äôve been watching the deregulation theme develop for months now. $FMKT ‚Äôs investment in $MCK represents a sophisticated play on this trend. As policy changes materialize in 2025-2026, companies like McKesson could see valuation multiples expand beyond current market expectations.

9/10 There are challenges: implementation timelines for regulatory changes can be unpredictable, and competitors will also benefit from industry-wide relief. But McKesson‚Äôs scale gives it advantages in capitalizing on regulatory shifts faster than smaller players.

8/10 The numbers tell the story: McKesson‚Äôs operating margins have room to expand significantly as compliance costs decrease. Even a 1-2% margin improvement would translate to hundreds of millions in additional profit given their $95.3B quarterly revenue base.

7/10 $FMKT ‚Äôs proprietary R2Q system identified $MCK by analyzing company efficiency, operating margins, and momentum. The AI cross-references regulatory databases with company filings to find firms with high sensitivity to policy changes.

6/10 When regulatory costs decrease, McKesson‚Äôs margins expand. The company‚Äôs recent strategic moves‚Äîacquiring PRISM Vision Holdings, expanding community practice management, enhancing specialty solutions‚Äîare perfectly positioned to capitalize on regulatory relief.

5/10 Trump‚Äôs executive orders from April-May 2025 signal a major shift: streamlined FDA approvals, revised Medicare Drug Price Negotiation rules, and domestic manufacturing incentives. These directly address pain points in McKesson‚Äôs business model.
